process_data.text: This command takes a normalized expression CSV, metadata CSV, and pre-computed weight torch file as input and produces a PRESCIENT training torch object.

train_model.text: This command trains a PRESCIENT model using a PRESCIENT training torch object.

simulate_trajectories.text: This command generates simulated trajectories from randomly initialized cells using a PRESCIENT model and training torch object.

perturbation_analysis.text: This command runs forward simulations of unperturbed cells and cells with perturbations of selected genes.
